tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I called Pradham Dental after seeing an article in social media about his clinic regarding Invisalign treatment. After having a crooked tooth for many years, the tooth started giving me some discomfort. I decided that I wanted to spend my twilight years enjoying life, eating my favorite foods and I was ready for a change. I am so pleased with my results from cosmetic treatment with Dr Ashok Chandra & Dr Praveen To me, my smile is worth every single penny that I have paid. Thank you Pradham Dental.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ***** ******* *** ** **** *** ** *** **** ******** ** ***** I'm so happy that I got in touch with him and got my dental scaling procedure done in his clinic. See, everyone needs a good dentist in their lives. It has always given me jitters. And what makes it even more uncomfortable is the general attitude of the dentist towards their patient .  I found Dr Ashok  to be very professional and thorough at his work and at the same time so jovial, understanding and mild mannered. He makes his patients feel at ease the moment one enters his clinic. Same goes for his staff Rajeshwari, hema and other staff itself. I might not have been to any better clinics maybe but, I can say that this was the best dental clinic I've visited so far. The whole ambience there, the staff, the doctor, makes it so easy for a person like me to visit that place again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited Dr. Ashok Chandra's Pradham Dental for my mom's dental issues. He is an experienced and very friendly doctor.  My mom was quite scared of the dentist, Dr Bindu and Dr Ashok made her very comfortable during the procedure. The staff are also polite and helpful. Definitely a recommended place for any dental issues.  thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thanks Doctor Ashok and Dr.Praveen, it has been a wonderful long journey of 13 months of my invisalign braces treatment at pradham dental. One of the best invisalign provider in south india, they have best and advanced scanners and great team. I highly recommend it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ashok Chandra has been my all-time favourite Dentist in accordance with Quality Treatment. For my Wisdom tooth extraction, he immediately goes for the tooth extraction. I was not prepared enough but the explanation of the problem and solution was in detail and clear. I got a complete understanding of the issue and it made for an unexpected extraction. And that was the best decision. The treatment was Painless. Thank you, Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Ashok Chandra and the whole team working at Pradham dental clinic are incredibly professional and skilled in the field of dentistry. I came to the clinic with my mother for full mouth implants.  Results are satisfactory and good follow up post treatment. Their prices are very reasonable as well. You won’t be disappointed!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Visited For Teeth Whitening




I have smoking habit and I chew pan daily so my teeth were yellow. I wanted a whiter smile before my marriage so I visited Pradham Dental near to my sister’s home. Team of dentists did my teeth whitening treatment by Zoom machine. My results were really happy. I got a brighter smile. Thanks (

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
Visited For Root Canal Treatment (RCT)





Few days ago I had severe tooth ache in one of my tooth and went to Pradham Dental as I came across some good reviews on Google for Dr. Ashok and Dr Harinath. My Root canal treatment was painless and also they have latest equipment for RCT, they took all safety measures during the treatment. Thank you Dr Harinath and Dr Ashok.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Pradham Dental is taking all COVID safety measures during the pandemic situation. * ** **** **** *** *** **** ****** ****** ** ********* following all the standards in dental treatments and safety measures for the patients. I recommend this center for dental implants.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to Pradham Dental for my wife as she had to extract her Wisdom tooth. We were concerned as extraction can be painful and we had a bad experience in the past with another dentist. We met Dr Ashok Chandra first and he explained the process, took the X-ray and explained in detail the extraction process and how close the tooth to nerves and any side effects etc but also assured us it will be smooth. It was an excellent treatment. My wife felt no pain during the treatment. Thank you dr Ashok and team.

review: I have been to many dentists in the hyderabad *** *** ***** ******* *** **** *** **** ** ***! Charges for root canal are also very affordable and I would recommend him to anyone in hyderabad looking for a dentist that they can trust.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: When I moved to Hyderabad, I was looking for an invisalign dentist in city and was lucky enough to find pradham dental. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have Invisalign (currently on 10th week) through Pradham Dental, and Dr.Ashok Chandra has been excellent throughout my treatment. He is continuously reminding me to brush my teeth and ensure that I keep my gums healthy during treatment and to stick with those habits post-treatment. A must go Dental Clinic!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got my teeth aligned with the help of the invisible braces here. It was a great experience; all doctors are very good and experienced. My teeths were so much crowded and it got perfect in just one year. The clinic is pocket friendly with very good treatment of international standards.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review:
Consulted Dr. Ashok Chandra (Dentist) for Teeth Gaps



I came to know through my colleague that Dr.Ashok Chandra’s Clinic Pradham Dental specializes in smile Invisible Braces Treatment. I was not happy with my teeth gaps in front teeth so I was searchjing for affordable treatment to fix that issue. After meeting him he and his team explained me about invisalign treatment and now I’m on 6th week after braces, result was so good and iam happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Consulted Dr. Ashok Chandra for Wisdom Tooth Extraction


1 week back I got my wisdom tooth extracted from Dr. Ashok and I must say his treatment was excellent and painless. They have very friendly and supportive staff. In this pandemic and lockdown situation they are maintaining proper safety protocols and hygienic environment.

tags: None
review: Went in for a smile makeover after knowing from colleague and the results have been spectacular and satisfactory. Procedures were explained in detail which was very calming for someone like me who is usually petrified of dentists bcz my marriage was just in few weeks. Definitely recommend for any orthodontic treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I came to know about pradham dental by my family doctor. I came here for my broken tooth and I was really very comfortable and they took all precautionary measures taken during this COVID-19 situation. They maintained clinic with proper sanitization and safety protocols.
Dr Ashok explained very well about problem and I am impressed with his patience *** ********* *** the way he explained about the treatment. Very good experience, I recommend it 100%!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Ashok and Dr Praveen turned out to be fantastic and very kind. They answered every question I had about invisalign treatment. They does not recommend unnecessary dental procedures. I would highly recommend pradham dental to everyone who are looking for invisible braces treatment in Hyderabad. Highly recommended.

I would strongly recommend my family and friends to visit this pradham dental clinic for their dental requirements.
